short unsigned int std::sudoku::Generator::nextValue (  short unsigned int  mod = 10,
unsigned short int  min = 1
)  [static]
 

Pseudo randomly creates a value between 1 and 3.

It uses rand() srand() and ctime() to create the value.

Returns:
psuedo random number

Definition at line 854 of file sudoku.cpp.

bool std::sudoku::Generator::solveCell (  Cell &  cell,
Line &  row,
Line &  col,
Box &  box,
short unsigned int  sol
)  throw (domain_error, logic_error) [static]
 

Set the cell to given state if possible.

After performing the solving operation, this function automatically updates the row, column and box where it resides.

  • cell reference to the cell to solve
  • row reference to the row in which the cell resides
  • col reference to the column in which the cell resides
  • box reference to the box in which the cell resides
  • sol Value to set the cell if possible
    Returns:
    true if the any of success happened, or false otherwise
    Exceptions:
    logic_error Thrown if no possibility is left in any of the cells tested
